text: @RandPaul Over 90,000 Americans are dead and many more are dying!!! Wake up, fool! This coronavirus-19 🦠 is very real and dangerous! Why are you protecting this deranged, dangerous and cruel Dear Leader Trump?  Wake up! There will be no more of us alive in this country! Trump is evil!
